Test Prompt: Show me today's restaurant orders and revenue. Break down by order status and highlight any patterns.
Expected Outcome: Revenue summary with order status breakdown

Test Prompt: What are the top 5 most popular menu items this month? Include quantity sold and revenue generated.
Expected Outcome: Top 5 menu items with sales data
